body_html:
The compile error comes from

-#if !EIGEN_VERSION_AT_LEAST(3, 3, 0)
-#error "Caffe2 requires Eigen to be at least 3.3.0.";
-#endif

So if we change it to

#if EIGEN_VERSION_AT_LEAST(3, 3, 0)

...
code
...

#endif

There will be no compile error and when the eigen version is lower than 3.3.0, the guarded code will not be compiled.

Another thing is that there is almost no one use this eigen conv_op. So remove it at all is also fine.

body:
The compile error comes from

-#if !EIGEN_VERSION_AT_LEAST(3, 3, 0)	
-#error "Caffe2 requires Eigen to be at least 3.3.0.";	
-#endif

So if we change it to

#if EIGEN_VERSION_AT_LEAST(3, 3, 0)

...
code
...

#endif 

There will be no compile error and when the eigen version is lower than 3.3.0, the guarded code will not be compiled.

Another thing is that there is almost no one use this eigen conv_op. So remove it at all is also fine.
